title: This is a much more detailed explanation of what happened !
description:
I am adding this to explain much more about what happened.

So In the first episode of the Animaniacs Reboot , Warner Bros. decided to publicly shame and tease Johnny Depp in a musical number for being a domestic violence survivor. 
I putted the picture for everyone that doesn’t have the idea of the full event . 
 Also if you want to see the full the video you can see it here :

https://twitter.com/johnnycdebt/status/1330257793769725952?s=20

Again I want to address how disgusting and unacceptable this is ! There is no excuse for this and they need to understand that what they did was beyond wrong !
